title: 8-Bit Game
description: A retro-style 8-bit game built, featuring pixel art graphics and simple old school game mechanics.
backstory: This 8-bit game project showcases classic game development techniques using modern web technologies. Built with HTML5 Canvas and JavaScript, it demonstrates how to create engaging retro-style games with pixel art graphics and smooth gameplay. The project highlights the intersection of nostalgia and modern web development.
